settings.text:
REYAL CREATES PERFORMANCE SKINCARE AND SUPPLEMENTS THAT WORK TO FUEL, STRENGTHEN AND PROTECT. BE GENTLE, MAN™

Vancouver, Canada
FREE SHIPPING OVER $125 | FREE RETURNS & SATISFACTION GUARANTEE

settings.title: REYAL SUPPLEMENTS
settings.description:
HIGH-PERFORMANCE SUPPLEMENT FORMULATIONS WITH ADDED BCAAS, CREATINE, GLUTAMINE AND COLLAGEN.  

DESIGNED TO OPTIMIZE RECOVERY TIME, STRENGTHEN MUSCLES AND PROTECT SKIN.

settings.heading: SUBSCRIBE TO REYAL
settings.newsletter--subheading:
SIGN UP FOR REYAL UPDATES, NEW PRODUCT RELEASES, TRAINING TIPS, 
AND 15% OFF YOUR FIRST ORDER. ENTER YOUR E-MAIL HERE:

settings.slide-tagline: ‏‏HIGH-PERFORMANCE SUPPLEMENT FORMULATIONS WITH ADDED BCAAS, CREATINE, GLUTAMINE AND COLLAGEN.    DESIGNED TO OPTIMIZE RECOVERY TIME, STRENGTHEN MUSCLES AND PROTECT SKIN. ‎‎‏‏‎ ‎

settings.heading: REYAL IS A PERFORMANCE SKINCARE AND SUPPLEMENT COMPANY BUILDING PRODUCTS BY AND FOR ATHLETES.
settings.text: We create men’s performance skincare and supplements that work to fuel, strengthen and protect skin. Skincare, like all health-driven initiatives, skincare is a long game, training for a better tomorrow. To be successful, one must be committed, regimented, diligent, and focused. Your skin, like your body, is a by-product of what you eat, how often you sweat, and how you take of yourself. We created REYAL for a man who’s committed to bettering himself, a man who’s not afraid to feel.

settings.title: SKIN PERFORMANCE
settings.description:
Much like traditional training supplements, REYAL performance skincare products are designed to rebuild, protect and optimize. We developed an intelligent skincare assortment designing skincare supplements that aid in performance recovery. Our proprietary RSFC™ tri-blend is designed to maximize results — it hosts superior concentrations of active ingredients that are easily absorbed by your skin. We took the best of the training supplements we use like Creatine, BCAAs, Glutamine and Collagen and engineered them to be powerful additives to help your skin perform.  

We think of our skin in the same way we do our bodies, like an athlete. Skincare is a long game, where training now leads to a better tomorrow. Trust us, your face (and your partner) will thank you.

settings.title: REYAL SUPPLEMENTS
settings.description: ‏‏HIGH-PERFORMANCE SUPPLEMENT FORMULATIONS WITH ADDED BCAAS, CREATINE, GLUTAMINE AND COLLAGEN. DESIGNED TO OPTIMIZE RECOVERY TIME, STRENGTHEN MUSCLES AND PROTECT SKIN. ‎‎‏‏‎ ‎

FOR ALL INQUIRIES, CUSTOMER SERVICE, MEDIA RELATIONS, STOCKIST INFORMATION OR TECHNICAL SUPPORT, PLEASE EMAIL:

INFO@REYALPERFORMANCE.COM  

YOU CAN FIND REYAL PERFORMANCE ON INSTAGRAM AND FACEBOOK HERE:

FACEBOOK / INSTAGRAM

settings.title: PERFORMANCE SUPPLEMENTS
settings.description:
REYAL performance supplements are designed to simplify your routine, combining the best assortment of traditional ingredients into single-use products that help your body recover, refuel and build muscle. We’ve included what we believe to be the essentials, supplements that support any type of training program and that give your body the fuel it needs to consistently perform at its best.

Training is a critical part of anyone’s collective health and wellness. Like skincare, it’s a long game requiring diligence, commitment, and consistency. REYAL performance adds to your arsenal of tools to help you maximize results.

We create men’s performance skincare and supplements that work to fuel, strengthen and protect skin. Skincare, like all health-driven initiatives, skincare is a long game, training for a better tomorrow. To be successful, one must be committed, regimented, diligent, and focused. Your skin, like your body, is a by-product of what you eat, how often you sweat, and how you take of yourself. We created REYAL for a man who’s committed to bettering himself, a man who’s not afraid to feel.

‏‏
‏‏‎ ‎↓
THE REYAL JOURNAL IS A COLLECTIVE RESOURCE MERGING RELEVANT TOPICS ON FITNESS, CULTURE AND HEALTH. FEATURING STORIES, TRAINING PROGRAMS AND REYAL AMBASSADORS

We create men’s performance skincare and supplements that work to fuel, strengthen and protect skin. Skincare, like all health-driven initiatives, skincare is a long game, training for a better tomorrow. To be successful, one must be committed, regimented, diligent, and focused. Your skin, like your body, is a by-product of what you eat, how often you sweat, and how you take of yourself. We created REYAL for a man who’s committed to bettering himself, a man who’s not afraid to feel.

‏‏
‏‏‎ ‎↓
THE REYAL JOURNAL IS A COLLECTIVE RESOURCE MERGING RELEVANT TOPICS ON FITNESS, CULTURE, AND HEALTH. FEATURING STORIES, TRAINING PROGRAMS, AND REYAL AMBASSADORS.

REYAL CREATES MEN’S PERFORMANCE SKINCARE AND SUPPLEMENTS THAT WORK TO FUEL, STRENGTHEN AND PROTECT. LIKE ANYTHING ELSE IN LIFE, IN ORDER TO BE SUCCESSFUL, YOU MUST BE COMMITTED, REGIMENTED, DILIGENT, AND FOCUSED. HOW YOUR SKIN LOOKS, AND HOW YOUR BODY FEELS, IS A DIRECT RESULT OF WHAT YOU EAT, HOW OFTEN YOU SWEAT, AND HOW YOU TAKE CARE OF YOURSELF.

WE CREATED REYAL FOR A MAN WHO’S COMMITTED TO CONTINUOUSLY BETTERING HIMSELF AND A MAN WHO’S NOT AFRAID TO FEEL.

settings.layer_1_heading: REYAL’s proprietary skincare formula uses three powerful ingredients
settings.layer_1_description: REYAL’s skincare performance formula combines the best of science and nature. Every REYAL skincare product includes our proprietary RSCF™ tri-blend. A custom combination of active ingredients: Dragon’s Blood, Tiger grass, and Vitamin E that work together to fuel, strengthen and protect your skin.
settings.layer_1_accordion_1_panel_right_entry_tx: A powerful and protective antioxidant found in sap from amazonian rainforest trees. Dragon's Blood is traditionally used as a topical aid for injuries to the skin such as cuts, bites, burns, stings and rashes.
settings.layer_1_accordion_1_panel_right_r2_txt: Its rich protective antioxidant phenols and anti-inflammatory compounds help to protect the cells of the skin, reducing both redness and inflammation.
settings.layer_1_accordion_1_panel_right_r3_c1_tx: Anti-inflammatory antioxidant compounds that cool the skin and reduce redness.
settings.layer_1_accordion_1_panel_right_r3_c2_tx: Contains Proanthocyanidins which work to repair collagen and Taspine, a known tissue-healing agent.
settings.layer_1_accordion_2_panel_right_entry_tx: Legend has it that Centella Asiatica got its nickname from tigers that would roll around in this plant after battle to soothe their wounds and promote recovery.
settings.layer_1_accordion_2_panel_right_r2_txt: Its powerful antioxidant properties and branched-chain amino acids revitalize the skins protective barrier, mitigate the visible effects of environmental stressors (sun, pollution), and encourage new skin regeneration.
settings.layer_1_accordion_2_panel_right_r3_c2_tx: Strengthens and replenishes skin’s moisture barrier to resist and reverse the signs of aging.
settings.layer_1_accordion_3_panel_right_entry_tx: Vitamin E is a naturally occurring compound in human skin that depletes over time from constant environmental exposure in the absence of sun protection. Vitamin E is an important antioxidant protecting cell membranes and preventing damage to associated enzymes.
settings.layer_1_accordion_3_panel_right_r2_headi: THE WORKHORSE OF THE RSCF™ TRI-BLEND
settings.layer_1_accordion_3_panel_right_r2_txt: By adding additional antioxidant and anti-inflammatory properties, it helps defend the skin from pollution and other environmental stressors that weaken skin.
settings.layer_1_accordion_3_panel_right_r3_c1_tx: Positively affects blood circulation to prevent aging and increase firmness of skin.
settings.layer_1_accordion_3_panel_right_r3_c2_tx: Vitamin E helps fight the effect of free radicals that cause signs of aging like wrinkles and enlarged pores.
settings.layer_2_heading: REYAL’S LAYERING SYSTEM IS MADE UP OF THREE SIMPLE STEPS
settings.layer_2_description: The REYAL skincare assortment was designed to make skincare efficient. A simple 3-layered approach whereby each product adds value to the next, amplifying performance and long-term results. We think of our skin in the same way we do our bodies, like an athlete. So, train your skin.
settings.layer_2_accordion_1_panel_right_entry_tx: A detoxifying face gel wash delivering an invigorating and deep pore clean.
settings.layer_2_accordion_1_panel_right_r2_headi: Designed to cleanse, fuel, and activate
settings.layer_2_accordion_1_panel_right_r2_txt: Effectively exfoliates and removes debris, dirt, and oil without over drying or excessive tightness. Leaving skin feeling clean, refreshed, and smooth.
settings.layer_2_accordion_1_panel_right_r3_c1_tx: Massage over wet face and neck every morning, night, and post-sweat for 1 minute.
settings.layer_2_accordion_1_panel_right_r3_c2_tx: Active ingredients include peppermint, caffeine, antioxidants, exfoliants and the RSCF™ tri-blend.
settings.layer_2_accordion_2_panel_right_entry_tx: A high performance, anti-aging and skin strengthening daily Vitamin C serum.
settings.layer_2_accordion_2_panel_right_r2_headi: Designed to strengthen, hydrate and repair skin
settings.layer_2_accordion_2_panel_right_r2_txt: Powerful antioxidant formulation combining Vitamin C, Ferulic and Hyaluronic acids that work together to defend against environmental aggressors, sweat, and combat visible signs of aging.
settings.layer_2_accordion_2_panel_right_r3_c1_tx: Smooth two pumps of Layer 002 Select Day Serum into face and neck.
settings.layer_2_accordion_2_panel_right_r3_c2_tx: Active ingredients include Vitamin C, Hyaluronic Acid, Ferulic Acid, Antioxidants and the RSCF™ tri-blend.
settings.layer_2_accordion_3_panel_right_entry_tx: A lightweight, non-greasy, anti-shine daily moisturizer with UVA/UVB protection. Packed with creatine, proteins and BCAA’s to strengthen skin.
settings.layer_2_accordion_3_panel_right_r2_headi: Designed to protect against UVA/UVB exposure and strengthen skin
settings.layer_2_accordion_3_panel_right_r2_txt: Ultra-sheer and anti-shine, high antioxidant protection broad spectrum UVA/UVB shield defending against high impact environmental elements: sun, sweat and pollution. Non-acnegenic.
settings.layer_2_accordion_3_panel_right_r3_c1_tx: Smooth a small amount of Layer 003 Super Day Moisturizer into face and neck.
settings.layer_2_accordion_3_panel_right_r3_c2_tx: Active ingredients include antioxidants, creatine, BCAAs, proteins and the RSCF™ tri-blend.

settings.right_product_description: Bright and refreshing, this apéritif blends fresh grapefruit, Makrut lime leaves, pink peppercorn, and a subtle kick of fresh jalapeño. Try it on the rocks or with a squeeze of fresh citrus.

settings.center_review_main_title: WHAT PEOPLE ARE SAYING ABOUT US
settings.review_coustomer_review_desc1: Les 3 niveaux qui composent le boîtier donnent à la montre une silhouette fine et élancée. Chaque étage a une finition différente dont les reflets sous la lumière sont particulièrement captivants. Le taillage d’une extrême finesse des 120 crans de la couronne la rende précieuse comme un bijou. Le numéro de la collection est gravé sur le fond de la montre ainsi que la signature d’Apose : pure, automatique et très française.

settings.right_product_description: Bright and refreshing, this apéritif blends fresh grapefruit, Makrut lime leaves, pink peppercorn, and a subtle kick of fresh jalapeño. Try it on the rocks or with a squeeze of fresh citrus.

settings.wearing_subtitle: Tag us on Instagram @reyalperformance to have your look featured.
settings.comfort_subtitle: Reyal's premium athletic gear and supply department is designed for an active life, prioritizing fit, fucntion and comfort. We select apparel partners, products, and styles that emphasize quality, design, and creativity. We wear our gear hard [in the gym] and chose products that's wash well, stretch right, and look better with age.

settings.right_product_description: Bright and refreshing, this apéritif blends fresh grapefruit, Makrut lime leaves, pink peppercorn, and a subtle kick of fresh jalapeño. Try it on the rocks or with a squeeze of fresh citrus.
